messages.title: Re-elect Tommy Sheppard
messages.content: Tommy Sheppard argues for re-election to ensure Brexit does not harm the rights and services of the future of Scotland. A Tory Brexit implies longer NHS wait times and weaker protection for our environment and wants SNP to stop Brexit and put Scotland's future in its own hands.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: SNP will fight for Scotland's right to choose its future and oppose indefinite retention in the UK due to Tory Brexit harming the NHS, worker's rights, and environmental protection.
Tommy Sheppard aims to tackle climate emergency, with support for the SNP's increased action, fair tax system, and public services.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Tommy Sheppard states that only the SNP can keep Scotland's future in its own hands and ensure that they do not have to accept a Brexit deal they did not vote for.

issues.brexitEurope: Tommy Sheppard emphasizes that a Tory Brexit will damage Scotland, leading to longer NHS wait times, and weaker environmental protection.
issues.economy: The SNP plans to fight poverty and tackle climate change rather than focus on Brexit.
issues.environment: The SNP is committed to tackling the climate emergency and was supportive of recent climate protests, and Tommy Sheppard personally fought against and won against fracking.
issues.governance: Tommy Sheppard discusses the choices at Westminster have left people less empowered and wants decisions for Scotland to be made by the people of Scotland in their own parliament.
issues.health: Worries about longer NHS waiting times as a potential issue post-Brexit.

leaflet.personalStatement: Tommy Sheppard has experience as an effective and powerful local advocate and has previously worked at Westminster for Edinburgh East.

politicalExperience.achievements: Fought against fracking and won. Supports recent climate protests.

images.caption: Photo of Tommy Sheppard with his partner Kate and their dog, Corbyn.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Leaflet also includes personal endorsements from local residents supporting Tommy Sheppard for various reasons including trust, commitment to work hard, and advocacy for education, local and national issues.
